Hello all.  I have been in the group for a bit now, and just deciding when =
to come in.  I am a long time TF fan, since way back in G1 days.  Also, I b=
roke into PBeM role playing about a year ago, and it's one of my hobbies.  =
Anyway, I have finally made my decision.  Due to being a former WCW(a wrest=
ling company) in 1996, I have decided I will join the New World Order.  I w=
ill make characters for other groups soon though.  Seeing as how they like =
to base their characters on wrestlers, I will stick with the trend.  I'm no=
t sure how many characters we are allowed to have, but it looks like some p=
eople have a small handful, so I will just start off with three.  Savage, W=
rath and Crush, if you will.
